system.biography:
TitleFFF 601-1 Priestess Agrik
Birthday22 Navek 695
AppearanceAge 24, height 5’ 10”, light frame, weight 144 lb, average appearance, medium complexion, brown hair, hazel eyes
Medical/PsycheNone
Size6
ArmorHigh quality, long sleeved cloth tunic and leggings; quilted vest; kurbul ailettes, breast and back plates; leather calf boots, plate half-helm, dagger and mace
Other EquipmentBelt pouch
Valuables130d in silver and £2 in gold in a money pouch. Gold and gem incrusted Agrikan holy symbol (700d)
Notes

Biography

People knew Mya was special from the day she was born. An only child, her mother died in childbirth; her father is a cousin and household knight to Sir Gerd Risalsin, Baron of Thiri in Rethem. Frequently away on missions for his liege, her father left her to be raised by her wet nurse. Despite this, Mya flourished. She sang regularly for the Baron, quickly becoming his favourite.

At age 16, Mya attended the Slaughterfest ceremonies in Golotha with the Baron’s household. Her unearthly sounding voice soared above everyone else’s. It captured the attention of the Aperagris (Master of the High Discipline), of the Order of the Octagonal Pit. He approached the Baron, complimented her on her singing and “asked” him if she could become one of his acolytes.

Mya had always been different than other children. She acted older and wiser than her years; leading people to shy away from her and whisper she had an “old and powerful soul.” She also had the uncanny and frightening ability to know what people we thinking or going to do before they knew themselves. After sensing the fear it created in others, Mya was quick to disguise her abilities.

At the arena, she sensed that if the Baron refused the Aperagris’ “request,” he would be killed and she would be forced to join the order anyway. Before the Baron could refuse, she begged him to “allow her this great honour.”

Although not the strongest or smartest acolyte, Mya has thrived in the Order. Over the last nine years, she has risen quickly to the rank of Aperagrisherucha (Heruchai (Lieutenant) to the Master of the High Discipline). She has miraculously survived no less than eleven assassination attempts, all by ambushing and killing her attackers, usually with her dagger. They say when she looks at people she sees into their souls. Secretly, even her master is afraid of her. Mya knows it and revels in her power.

Although based in Golotha, Mya travels frequently for the Aperagris and often visits Coranan and Shiran. She has also participated in several hunts for special creatures destined for the Pamesani Arena.

Adventure Hooks

Spies. The PCs are travelling in Rethem or Tharda undercover. They walk past an Agrikan priestess and her escort. Suddenly, she spins around and yells, “Seize them!” She interrogates and tortures them, but seems to know the answers before they give them.

Monster Hunting. The Octagonal Pit wants a particular type of ivashu for the arena. No one else has been able to find one, so Mya is sent to lead the mission. The PCs are hired on to serve this frightening priestess.

Credits

This character is taken from “Friends, Foes, and Followers, Vol. 1” on Lythia.com (https://www.lythia.com/game_aides/friends-foes-followers-volume-1/), by Kerry Mould, with illustrations by Richard Luscheck and Juha Makkonen, and is “fanon”, a derivative work of copyrighted material by Columbia Games Inc. and N. Robin Crossby.
